EmailTemplate.subject: Last Chance to Register! | Turbonomic 5.9 Release Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/turbonomic-5-9-release-channel-webinar/]]> Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Partner}}, With Turbonomic 5.9, your customers can unleash the power of the hybrid cloud. Join us tomorrow for our biggest release <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/turbonomic-5-9-release-channel-webinar/]]> yet at 11am EST. We will showcase the new enhancements available with Turbonomic 5.9. During this webinar, you will learn how you can provide your customers with a blueprint for safely accelerating their journey to the public cloud. Your customers are faced with incredible pressure to modernize and public cloud is central to their transformation. According to a JPMorgan survey of CIO’s, more than 40% of workloads could shift to the public cloud and the greater cloud market is forecasted by IDC to be $500B by 2020. Customers have more questions than answers when it comes to assuring performance, lowering cost, and ensuring compliance in the cloud. What’s New with Turbonomic 5.9:
- Cloud Migration Planning: Accurately match what customers consume on premises to what they need to consume in public cloud to assure performance while lowering cloud costs - Lower Cloud Costs: Automatically scale down or suspend workloads reducing costs without impacting performance - Budget Control: Cloud bills are aggregated across services, regions, accounts and lines of business and tracked in a single view against defined budget - Workload Specific Cost: Workload specific costs, within the cloud, are continuously tracked and reported by regions, tags or custom groups - Cloud Cost Forecasting: Project future monthly cloud bills to accurately plan and budget - Hybrid Cloud Visibility: Single pane of glass for resource consumption across on-premises data centers and cloud services. - Anti-Affinity Enforcement: Designated HA workloads are spread across multiple cloud regions and availability zones or data center, cluster and hosts on-premises complying with risk management specifications for mission critical applications
This webinar will be approximately an hour. Register Here <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/turbonomic-5-9-release-channel-webinar/]]>! We hope you can make it! Best, - the Turbonomic Partner team
